title: 7.1.3 Implement credential encryption
body:
## Parent Issue
#29 - 7.1 AWS Account Connection

## Objective
Implement Fernet encryption for access keys at rest.

## Requirements
- Use cryptography.fernet for AES encryption
- Key from AWS Secrets Manager (not env vars)
- Never log decrypted credentials

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/encryption.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Encryption key loaded from Secrets Manager
- [ ] Encrypt/decrypt works correctly
- [ ] No credentials in logs

## Estimated Time: 1.5 hours
